description:
drive: Simplify FileSystem::GetResourceEntryByPath()

Merge FileSystem::CheckLocalModificationAndRun() and ResourceMetadata::GetResourceEntryByPath() into a new function GetLocallyStoredResourceEntry().
Remove some misleading/unnecessary comments.

BUG=None
TEST=unit_tests
R=hidehiko@chromium.org

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=214284

messages.text:
lgtm with a nitpick.

https://codereview.chromium.org/19471013/diff/8001/chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/19471013/diff/8001/chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc#newcode82
chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc:82: util::ConvertPlatformFileInfoToResourceEntry(file_info, &entry_file_info);
nit: you can use entry->mutable_file_info() directly, here?

https://codereview.chromium.org/19471013/diff/8001/chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc
File chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/19471013/diff/8001/chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc#newcode82
chrome/browser/chromeos/drive/file_system.cc:82: util::ConvertPlatformFileInfoToResourceEntry(file_info, &entry_file_info);
On 2013/07/29 09:01:23, hidehiko wrote:
> nit: you can use entry->mutable_file_info() directly, here?

Good catch, done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/hashimoto@chromium.org/19471013/13001

Retried try job too often on win7_aura for step(s) interactive_ui_tests
http://build.chromium.org/p/tryserver.chromium/buildstatus?builder=win7_aura&number=64483
Committed patchset #2 manually as r214284 (presubmit successful).

subject: drive: Simplify FileSystem::GetResourceEntryByPath()
